tool_description: Monitors patient medication compliance by tracking prescription fills, missed doses, and adherence patterns.

prescription_ids.description: List of prescription IDs to monitor

monitoring_period_days.description: Number of days to analyze adherence (30-365)

include_pharmacy_data.description: Whether to include pharmacy fill data

error_messages: Patient not found: The provided patient_id is not valid.
Invalid prescription IDs: One or more prescription IDs are not recognized.
Invalid monitoring period: Monitoring period must be between 30-365 days.
Insufficient data: Not enough prescription data available for the specified period.
Too many prescriptions: Maximum 20 prescriptions can be monitored simultaneously.
usage: Provide patient_id and prescription_ids to track. Optionally adjust monitoring_period_days and pharmacy data inclusion for customized adherence analysis.

medication_adherence_scores.description: Individual adherence scores for each medication

missed_dose_count.description: Total number of missed doses identified

adherence_trend.description: Adherence pattern: improving, stable, or declining
